meanings.definition: A colorless liquid compound used in the production of plastics and resins.
meanings.sent1: The factory produced butyral for making new plastic toys.
meanings.sent2: The butyral was essential in creating durable materials.
meanings.sent3: The butyral decided to join the plastic party and have a colorful time.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like butyral, molding ideas into solid forms.
meanings.sent5: The butyral shimmered in the sunlight, promising endless possibilities in plastic production.

meanings.definition: A type of synthetic resin made from butyraldehyde and formaldehyde.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman used butyral to craft beautiful resin sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The market was flooded with various butyral resin products.
meanings.sent3: The butyral resin joked with the formaldehyde resin about their chemical origins.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like butyral resin, solidifying into reality with each step.
meanings.sent5: The butyral resin gleamed like a precious gem, capturing the light in a mesmerizing dance.

meanings.definition: A type of plastic film made from polyvinyl butyral, commonly used in safety glass.
meanings.sent1: The car windows were protected by a layer of polyvinyl butyral.
meanings.sent2: The polyvinyl butyral film ensured the safety of the passengers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous polyvinyl butyral film played hide-and-seek with the glass.
meanings.sent4: Her vision was clear as polyvinyl butyral, seeing through obstacles effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The polyvinyl butyral film acted as a shield, guarding against unexpected dangers on the road.
